name: The House of the Dead 4 Game
name_original: The House of the Dead 4 Game
description:
Save the world from nuclear disaster while old enemies and evil creatures stand in your way in this exciting shooting game. Enhanced graphics, co-op play, and PlayStation®Move motion controller compatibility bring an intense arcade experience right to your living room. Play as AMS Agent James Taylor or Kate Green through a series of gory levels and see if you have what it takes to save the world before it's too late.



PlayStation®Move features require PlayStation®Move motion controller and PlayStation®Eye (sold separately).

Software subject to license (us.playstation.com/softwarelicense). Online features require an account and are subject to terms of service and applicable privacy policy (playstationnetwork.com/terms-of-service & playstationnetwork.com/privacy-policy). One time license fee entitles play on up to 2 PlayStation® 3 systems activated by this account.
